All the features you need, and more

We’ve got technology covered. Now you can focus on delivering an unforgettable experience for your attendees.

Live Streams

Broadcast via live (or recorded) videos, share presentations, and stream screencasts to your global audience.

Gamification​

Encourage participation and action with fun and friendly challenges. Reward top users to build brand loyalty.

Personalized Content

Provides attendees with the flexibility to customize their experience by adding their favourite sessions and content.

Live Poll and Word Cloud

Send your participants live updates and sponsored posts to keep them informed throughout the event.

Public and Private Chat

Turn your viewers into active participants by enabling them to interact via text and video chats.

Live Q&A

Allow‌ ‌participants to pose questions to speakers during sessions, and have speakers reply in real-time.

Multi-track Schedule

Use color-coded tags to indicate the various tracks. Allow easy filtering and selection of interests.

Breakout Sessions

Hold product demos, workshops and networking sessions with our built-in video-conferencing feature.

Multimedia Library

Share presentation decks, whitepapers, videos, and other materials all in a centralised hub.

Business Matching

Our business matching algorithm allows attendees to connect with each other as easily as possible.

Push Notifications

Energize your audience by running live word cloud poll to discover what the crowd is feeling

Analytics & Reports

Track and analyze all of your data with our powerful analytics tools after your event

Frequently Asked Questions

What is an Event Management System

An Event Management System is a software application used to create, plan, execute and measure events effectively. It streamlines the process from planning, promotion, to registration, ticketing, attendee engagement, to post-event survey and reporting.

How long does it take to implement Micepad Event Management System?

For organization-wide rollouts, our system typically takes 1-3 months to set up. During the implementation process, our implementation specialists can help you plan your timeline and guide you through setting up your Micepad instance and developing training materials for your organization.

Is Micepad Event Management Software secure?
Micepad safeguards your your organization and teams. Our company is ISO 27001 certified and we offer end-to-end data encryption, SSO, high availability, disaster recovery, and more to your data is safe and secure.
What makes Micepad different from other Event Management Platform?

Micepad is an award-winning provider of event management software, with a unique focus on capturing and surfacing data from live events. 

Micepad offers a complete all-in-one solution for event management and stands out from its user-friendly interface and responsive customer support.

From virtual and hybrid event solutions to advanced data security, Micepad is a platform that evolves with changing landscape in the event industry.
